languages.text: Тела легковерных глупцов, поверивших Жертве, испаряются и обращаются в кровавый туман. Те, кому повезло больше, стреляют по мне, и один из снарядов повергает меня наземь. С разъяренным клекотом я добиваю их точечными выстрелами из карабина. Низвергнуть меня — несмываемое оскорбление!

The bodies of the gullible fools who believed the Prey evaporate and turn into bloody mist. The luckier ones fire at me and one of the shots brings me to the ground. I wail furiously and finish them off with pointed bursts from my shardcarbine. To cast me down is an indelible insult!
languages.original_text: Тела легковерных глупцов, поверивших Жертве, испаряются и обращаются в кровавый туман. Те, кому повезло больше, стреляют по мне, и один из снарядов повергает меня наземь. С разъяренным клекотом я добиваю их точечными выстрелами из карабина. Низвергнуть меня — несмываемое оскорбление!

traits.locale_text: The bodies of the gullible fools who believed the Prey evaporate and turn into bloody mist. The luckier ones fire at me, and one of the shots brings me to the ground. I screech furiously and finish them off with pointed bursts from my carbine. To cast me down is an indelible insult!

The bodies of the gullible fools who believed the Prey evaporate and turn into bloody mist. The luckier ones fire at me, and one of the shots brings me to the ground. I screech furiously and finish them off with pointed bursts from my carbine. To cast me down is an indelible insult!

The bodies of the gullible fools who believed the Prey evaporate and turn into bloody mist. The luckier ones fire at me and one of the shots knocks me off my feet. I wail furiously and finish them off with pointed bursts from my Shardcarbine. I was cast down, an unforgivable insult!

The bodies of the gullible fools who believed the Prey evaporate and turn into bloody mist. The luckier ones fire at me and one of the shots knocks me off my feet. I wail furiously and finish them off with pointed bursts from my Shardcarbine. I was cast down, an unforgivable insult!

The bodies of the gullible fools who believed the Prey evaporate and turn into bloody mist. The luckier ones fire at me and one of the shots brings me to the ground. I wail furiously and finish them off with pointed bursts from my shardcarbine. To cast me down is an indelible insult!

The bodies of the gullible fools who believed the Prey evaporate and turn into bloody mist. The luckier ones fire at me and one of the shots brings me to the ground. I wail furiously and finish them off with pointed bursts from my shardcarbine. To cast me down is an indelible insult!

languages.text: 獲物を信じた騙されやすい愚か者たちの死体は蒸発し、血まみれの霧と化す。運に見放さなれなかった連中は私に向かって発砲し、そのうちの一発で私は地面に倒れこんだ。私は激しく泣き叫びながら、シャードカービンの鋭い一撃で奴らを仕留めた。許しがたい侮辱だ！
languages.original_text: The bodies of the gullible fools who believed the Prey evaporate and turn into bloody mist. The luckier ones fire at me and one of the shots brings me to the ground. I wail furiously and finish them off with pointed bursts from my shardcarbine. To cast me down is an indelible insult!

traits.locale_text: 獲物を信じた騙されやすい愚か者たちの死体は蒸発し、血まみれの霧と化す。運に見放さなれなかった連中は私に向かって発砲し、そのうちの一発で私は足から転げ落ちた。私は激しく泣き叫びながら、シャードカービンの鋭い一撃で奴らを仕留めた。許しがたい侮辱だ！

languages.text: 那些轻信的白痴在手雷的火焰中爆开，化成了一团团血雾，而那些侥幸没死的人开始朝我开枪，其中一枪打中了我，我掉落到了地上。我愤怒地尖叫起来，用碎片卡宾枪朝他们倾泻着弹雨，把他们全都杀光了。他们居然敢对我动手？这简直是不可饶恕的侮辱！
languages.original_text: The bodies of the gullible fools who believed the Prey evaporate and turn into bloody mist. The luckier ones fire at me and one of the shots brings me to the ground. I wail furiously and finish them off with pointed bursts from my shardcarbine. To cast me down is an indelible insult!

traits.locale_text: 那些轻信的白痴在手雷的火焰中爆发，化成了一团团血雾，而那些侥幸没死的人开始朝我开枪，其中一枪打到了我的脚上。我愤怒地尖叫起来，用碎片卡宾枪朝他们倾泻着弹雨，把他们全都杀光了。他们居然敢对我动手？这简直是不可饶恕的侮辱！

languages.text: Los cuerpos de los crédulos que creyeron a la presa se evaporan y se convierten en una niebla sanguinolenta. Los más afortunados me disparan y uno de los tiros me hace caer al suelo. Aúllo con furia y acabo con ellos con ráfagas de mi carabina cristalina. Me han derribado, ¡es un insulto intolerable!
languages.original_text: The bodies of the gullible fools who believed the Prey evaporate and turn into bloody mist. The luckier ones fire at me and one of the shots brings me to the ground. I wail furiously and finish them off with pointed bursts from my shardcarbine. To cast me down is an indelible insult!

traits.locale_text: Los cuerpos de los crédulos que creyeron a la presa se evaporan y se convierten en una niebla sanguinolenta. Los más afortunados me disparan y uno de los tiros me hace perder el equilibrio. Aúllo con furia y acabo con ellos con ráfagas de mi carabina cristalina. Me han derribado, ¡es un insulto imperdonable!

languages.text: Die Leichen der naiven Narren, die der Beute geglaubt hatten, werden in einen blutigen Nebel aufgelöst. Die Glücklicheren feuern auf mich, und einer der Schüsse lässt mich abstürzen. Ich kreische zornig auf und gebe ihnen mit gezielten Salven aus dem Splitterkarabiner den Rest. Mich abzuschießen ist eine nicht zu tolerierende Beleidigung!
languages.original_text: The bodies of the gullible fools who believed the Prey evaporate and turn into bloody mist. The luckier ones fire at me and one of the shots brings me to the ground. I wail furiously and finish them off with pointed bursts from my shardcarbine. To cast me down is an indelible insult!

traits.locale_text: Die Leichen der naiven Narren, die der Beute geglaubt hatten, werden in einen blutigen Nebel aufgelöst. Wer entkommt, der feuert auf mich, und einer der Schüsse wirft mich um. Ich kreische zornig auf und gebe ihnen mit gezielten Salven aus dem Splitterkarabiner den Rest. Ich wurde zu Boden geworfen, eine unverzeihliche Beleidigung!

languages.text: Les corps des imbéciles qui ont cru la proie s'évaporent en une brume sanglante. Les plus chanceux continuent à me tirer dessus, et l'un d'entre eux parvient même à me faire chuter. Je hurle et achève l'impudent de plusieurs salves de ma carabine éclateuse. Me forcer à atterrir est une insulte impardonnable !
languages.original_text: The bodies of the gullible fools who believed the Prey evaporate and turn into bloody mist. The luckier ones fire at me and one of the shots brings me to the ground. I wail furiously and finish them off with pointed bursts from my shardcarbine. To cast me down is an indelible insult!

traits.locale_text: Les corps des imbéciles qui ont cru la proie s'évaporent en une brume sanglante. Les plus chanceux continuent à me tirer dessus, et l'un d'entre eux parvient même à m'atteindre et à me faire chuter. Je hurle et achève l'impudent de plusieurs salves de ma carabine éclateuse. J'ai été forcé d'atterrir ! C'est une insulte impardonnable !

languages.text: Av'ın sözüne inanan kerizlerin bedeni buharlaşıyor ve kanlı bir sis oluşturuyor. İçlerinde şanslı olanlar bana ateş ediyor ve bu ateşlerden biri beni yere indiriyor. Öfkeyle feryat ediyorum ve parçakarabinamdan çıkan isabetli atışlarla işlerini bitiriyorum. Yere indirilmek benim için ağır bir hakaret!
languages.original_text: The bodies of the gullible fools who believed the Prey evaporate and turn into bloody mist. The luckier ones fire at me and one of the shots brings me to the ground. I wail furiously and finish them off with pointed bursts from my shardcarbine. To cast me down is an indelible insult!

traits.locale_text: Av'ın sözüne inanan kerizlerin bedeni buharlaşıyor ve kanlı bir sis oluşturuyor. İçlerinde şanslı olanlar bana ateş ediyor ve bu ateşlerden biri beni yere indiriyor. Öfkeyle feryat ediyorum ve parçakarabinamdan çıkan isabetli atışlarla işlerini bitiriyorum. Yere indirilmek benim için ağır bir hakaret!
